name: Super Dragon Ultimate Warrior
description:
- FLY and DASH with amazing power-ups
- DODGE and JUMP all obstacles
- Collect star to BOOST
- EASY CONTROLS, just tap and shoot tap
- Layout fully optimized for smartphones and tablets
- Cool adventure for all ages (yes! everybody!)

Have fun with your FRIENDS
Get it while it's FREE

- Finally a running game that with different interesting objectives. Great game!
- I think it's a very fun game!
- Caution! This is a very addictive game!
- Can't wait to unlock all stages
- Fun game for all age
- Brilliant game… every level is different
- This is a wicked game! It's a fun character
- This free game is amazing!
